replies.msg:
Apply 左大貓Customer service officer (BT)
雖然知道CSO/bt 工作內容一樣但career path係唔係一樣？
睇番其他CSO 就無(BT)尼個字眼，咁我係咪姐係apply 左BT? 個鬼婆phone interview 係講customer service branch trainee officer

另外完左phone interview,佢叫我做online assessment 但我個submission status 寫住phone interview or role play exercise has been completed 而唔係online assessment required.

有收到online assessment email 但係份野同之前apply 恒生既一樣，亦都pass 左，無得再做。

咁既情況係咪等 face to face email就得？

自己係U Grad, phone interview 個號碼又打唔通，email 又無留聯絡方法只係do not reply 果隻，然後上網得一個巴打問過但又無人答佢
